sentences: Pierre Dørge (born 28 February 1946) is a Danish avant-garde jazz guitarist.
A native of Copenhagen, Dorge belonged to a free-jazz big band from 1969 to 1971 that was led by John Tchicai.
As leader of Thermaenius in 1978, he borrowed from Balkan folk music.
Two years later, he led the New Jungle Orchestra, borrowing from African styles.
